channel.title: Tracee on Code Before Breach
channel.description: Recent content in Tracee on Code Before Breach

item.title: Detection Frameworks and Latest Methodologies for eBPF-Based Backdoors
item.description: This article analyzes the rise of backdoors and rootkits exploiting eBPF, the detection challenges they pose, and comprehensively summarizes the latest countermeasures and research trends (2023â€“2025), including Tracee, LKRG, bpftool, and hypervisor-based auditing.
